summary: The Vehicle Axle Redistribution Increases Allow New Capacities for Efficiency Act (VARIANCE Act) amends Title 23 of the United States Code to allow a weight variance for commercial motor vehicles transporting dry bulk goods. Specifically, it allows these vehicles to exceed the axle weight limits by 10% (excluding the maximum gross vehicle weight). The bill defines "dry bulk goods" and aims to increase efficiency in the transportation of these goods.
